scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run serve" "cd front-end && npm run start"
scripts.installFrontEnd: cd front-end && npm install && cd .. && npm install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix front-end && npm run build --prefix front-end
scripts.production: cd front-end && npm run build && cd .. && npm run serve
